title: Scientists use a blender to reveal what's in our smartphones

title_detail.value: Scientists use a blender to reveal what's in our smartphones

summary: Scientists blended an entire smartphone to dust before conducting a chemical analysis of the dissolved results to demonstrate why we should all take a keener interest in what is contained within everyday electrical items.

summary_detail.value: Scientists blended an entire smartphone to dust before conducting a chemical analysis of the dissolved results to demonstrate why we should all take a keener interest in what is contained within everyday electrical items.
